TABLE_DEFINITIONS.Name: Real personal income and real personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) by state

LINE.Description: Real personal income (millions of constant (2017) dollars)
LINE.Definition: Real personal income is personal income at RPPs divided by the national PCE price index. It is estimated for states, state metro/nonmetro portions, metropolitan statistical areas, and the combined nonmetropolitan portion of the United States.

LINE.Description: Real per capita personal income (constant (2017) dollars)
LINE.Definition: Real per capita personal income is the real personal income divided by midyear population.

Real personal consumption expenditures for states are personal consumption expenditures divided by the RPPs and the national PCE price index. The result is a constant dollar (using 2017 as the base year) estimate of real personal consumption expenditures. Calculations are performed on unrounded data.
Real per capita personal consumption expenditures is total real personal consumption expenditures divided by total midyear population.
